post:
Evolution Host – 2GB KVM VPS meant for game servers for €6/month

canada, evolution-host.com, france, germany, highcpu, Montreal, nvme, virginia May 16, 2020 @ 6:31 am, by Jon Biloh

Mike from Evolution Host has reached out to provide a unique opportunity on a VPS package that is meant for game servers, with robust CPU speed thanks to their Intel i7 and AMD Ryzen CPUs. Note that this offer is the second ever to categorized as a “high cpu” offer as part of our new specializations. Evolution Host has been featured many times before on Low End Box going back years, and for that reason we now consider them a “Resident Host.”

This offer is provided from four different locations, including Strasbourg France, Frankfurt Germany, Montreal Canada and Virginia, USA.

Their WHOIS is public and you can find their ToS/Legal Docs here. They accept PayPal, credit/debit cards and a wide range of cryptocurrencies as payment methods.

What makes Evolution Host stand out from the crowd? In their own words: 

“We’re happy to let the LowEndBox community know that we are providing a first come first served 40% discount on our brand new Game VPS product.

The Game VPS service is a brand new addition to the Evolution Host arsenal and it provides all of the features of a typical VPS hosting service with some added perks. From a hardware perspective, the CPU’s utilized are specifically selected to provide optimal game server performance on the VPS. The VPS Game server comes equipped with a custom built control panel to help you easily install multiple game servers with the click of a button. The game servers can then be managed directly from the control panel.

As far as we are aware, this is a first of its kind service that combines traditional virtual server hosting with a complete game server management experience, resulting in the industries first true Game VPS. We are delighted to share this new Gaming VPS with the LowEndBox community and provide them with a 40% discount. The 40% discount is applicable to the first 30 people to use the GAMEVPS promotional code.”

Here’s the offer: 

INTENSE GAME VPS Package

  • 1x Full CPU @ 4.5Ghz – 5.0Ghz
  • 2GB DDR4 RAM
  • 20GB SSD
  • 1Gb/s Port
  • 10TB Monthly Transfer
  • 1 x IPv4
  • /112 IPv6
  • KVM/Virtualizor
  • Coupon: GAMEVPS
  • €6/month with promo code
  • €66/year
  • [ORDER HERE]

More information, including network specifications and node details, as always after the break.

Please let us know what you think of the offer in the comments below.
